summary: TIMING CHAIN RATTLE ON ECOBOOST ENGINE, I BELIEVE FORD ISSUED A BULLETIN ON IT, I FEEL IT SHOULD BE COVERED UNDER RECALL, MAKES A HORRENDOUS NOISE ON STARTUP EVERYTIME, AND ITS VERY EXPENSIVE TO FIX.  THE ENGINE FEELS AS IF IT IS ABOUT TO FALL OUT ON STARTUP ITS THAT LOUD, SHAKES THE WHOLE TRUCK.
